posts.content:
The 'movies' button on the BWA website is now working and it could do with a bit of testing please, if you find any glitches please let me know.

I have noticed that if you click a thumbnail before the page has fully loaded it opens in a window that is 'full' screen size and it shouldn't do that, it should be a small window in the middle of your screen.

If anyone knows of any BWA movies that are not on there please let me know about them!

Some seriously cool vids

I have to click a thumb nail & then press pause quickly, then play to watch a vid.
If i dont pause it jumps to the next vid without playing

Menace wrote:Some seriously cool vids

I have to click a thumb nail & then press pause quickly, then play to watch a vid.
If i dont pause it jumps to the next vid without playing


Yeah, it's not working quite right, try this....

Click on the movie page and then leave it for a while until you are sure the page has finished loading, can take a while... like 20-30 seconds. Then click a thunbnail.... it should just open in a small window in the middle of the screen.... and not flick on to the next one!

Hi jules,

Here's a couple of mine you could add;

http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=YnPcpU6zSK0

http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=7_uAk3nYeNU



Cheers


Andy

ive found that if i try watch them while using internet explorer they dont work, but fine on mozilla.....

ploon wrote:it doesn't work over here. when i click a thumbnail it goes nearly full screen, but it the loads the next video and then the next and so on.


The BWA movie pages have been fun & games, they have been displaying perfectly for me in both Firefox and IE7 but, as Pim says above, for others they have been showing full screen, which they shouldn't, and also loading the next movie, and it shouldn't do that either!

So, with a lot of help from my favorite Web adviser and general genius I have made some more changes, I'm hoping it should be displaying correctly for everyone now.

I need some feedback, so if you have read this please go and check out the BWA movie page and let me know if it's working OK, it should display like in the picture below.... which you can click and it will take you to the movie's!
